747140.name: Rumu - Soundtrack
747140.description:
This is the gripping original soundtrack for Rumu, an intimate, narrative-driven adventure that follows the path into sentience of a robot vacuum cleaner.

Track Listing

  • Consciousness Online
  • Ruminations In White
  • Curiosity
  • Unveiled
  • Innocence
  • Distance Only Grows
  • Attic
  • The Collapse
  • Elucidation
  • Hidden, Through
  • To Understand Love
  • Epilogue
  • Bleeps n Boops (Bonus Track)

Rumu Original Soundtrack © 2021 The Otherworld Agency Pty Ltd
Music by feeding | ear (Matt McLean)
